meanings.definition: A person who administers chemotherapy to treat cancer.
meanings.sent1: The chemotherapists carefully prepare the chemotherapy for the patient.
meanings.sent2: The hospital hired more chemotherapists to help with the increasing number of cancer cases.
meanings.sent3: The chemotherapists joked that mixing chemotherapy was like creating a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: The chemotherapists are the warriors fighting against cancer with their powerful weapon.
meanings.sent5: The image of the chemotherapists diligently working to save lives stayed with me.

meanings.definition: A medical professional specializing in the use of chemotherapy.
meanings.sent1: The experienced chemotherapists knew exactly how to adjust the chemotherapy dosage.
meanings.sent2: Becoming a chemotherapists requires years of specialized training and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The chemotherapists were like wizards using chemotherapy to battle the evil cancer cells.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cancer treatment, the chemotherapists are the heroes in white coats.
meanings.sent5: The role of the chemotherapists in saving lives cannot be overstated.

meanings.definition: Those who provide chemotherapy treatment to patients.
meanings.sent1: The team of chemotherapists worked together to ensure each patient received the best care.
meanings.sent2: The chemotherapists comforted the patients during their chemotherapy sessions.
meanings.sent3: The chemotherapists turned the chemotherapy room into a place of hope and healing.
meanings.sent4: To the patients, the chemotherapists were the angels guiding them through a difficult journey.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the chemotherapists shone brightly in the oncology department.
